original_text: But if the ox were wont to push with his horn in time past, and it hath been testified to his owner, and he hath not kept him in, but that he hath killed a man or a woman; the ox shall be stoned, and his owner also shall be put to death.
korean_text: 소가 본래 받는 버릇이 있고 그 임자는 그로 말미암아 경고를 받았으되 단속하지 아니하여 남녀를 막론하고 받아 죽이면 그 소는 돌로 쳐죽일 것이고 임자도 죽일 것이며

sentences.original_text: But if the ox were wont to push with his horn
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 소가 그 뿔로 밀려는 습관이 있었다면

sentences.original_text: and it hath been testified to his owner
and he hath not kept him in
but that he hath killed a man or a woman

sentences.korean_translation: 그 소는 돌로 맞아 죽을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and his owner also shall be put to death
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 주인 역시 죽음을 당할 것이다
